name: cermont-atg
description: Sistema integral de gestión de órdenes de trabajo ATG - Cermont

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace backend && npm run lint --workspace frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace backend && npm run lint:fix --workspace frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace backend && npm run type-check --workspace frontend
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace backend && npm run format --workspace frontend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --workspace backend && npm run format:check --workspace frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace backend && npm run clean --workspace frontend && npm run clean:root
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:migrate: npm run prisma:generate --workspace backend && npm run db:push --workspace backend
scripts.postinstall: npm run prisma:generate && npm run jwks:generate
scripts.audit:fix: npm audit fix --workspaces && npm audit fix

author: Cermont SAS
